data.title: Arnon Milchan Biography (1944-)
data.text:
Theatre, Film, and Television Biographies

Peter McEnery to Gene Milford

Arnon Milchan Biography (1944-)

Born December 6, 1944, in Tel Aviv, Palestine (now Israel); father, an ownerof a fertilizer company; married Brigitte Genmaire (a model; divorced, c. 1975); children: Alexandra and Elinor (production company executives), Yariv (aphotographer). Addresses: Office: New Regency Enterprises, 10201 WestPico Blvd., Building 12, Los Angeles, CA 90035.

Nationality

Palestinian

Gender

Male

Occupation

Film producer, executive
